name: Muzika mizrahit
description: Middle Eastern-flavored Israeli popular music, usually performed by Mizrahi Jews, and combining aspects of the music of the North African, Middle Eastern, and Central Asian countries from which they descended.

children.name: Muzikat dika'on
children.description: Depressing, somber lyrics and dramatic deliveries, more influenced by Turkish Music and Arabic Music in comparison to the lighthearted, playful, later varieties of Muzika mizrahit.
